name: Monster Hunger (Unfinished)
description:
Made for De-make Jam. Intended to be de-make of Monster Hunter. Eat the monster. (Unfinished)

Controls: [ARROW KEYS] Up, Left, Right

(Note: Squares can miss you and then begin orbiting the player character's head. This will prevent you from getting any more squares.)

Ran out of time again. I really gotta stop trying to build new systems the whole time and just keep it simple, and focus more on visual and sound design for once. Anyways, I do like the very bouncy look the physics setup gives everything, so I'll probably revisit this idea soon.
